/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of nature and light to the urban landscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
